title.value: Issues of market development of agribusiness: selected works: in 2 books. Book 1
Вопросы рыночного развития АПК: избранные труды: в 2 кн. Кн. 1

person.name: Gusakov, V.G., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: The main works of the independent Belarus and the formation in the Republic of market economic relations were presented. The published works were the logic of formation and development of a market economy as the inevitable basis of an effective state, for it could not only trace the phasing formation of the agrarian market in the country, but the biggest problems and solutions faced by the agricultural sector in Belarus during the different periods of its operation. It was characteristic that in all the presented works was given a constructive solution of the arising contradictions and difficulties, formulated the system most appropriate prospects. It was noteworthy that the collection included not only works, reflecting the conditions of the transition period to a market economy and the establishment of the market economy itself, but also of the historical nature allowing for analogies and comparisons of the current agrarian reform with the problems that were in agriculture in the earlier stages of development in the Stolypin's reforms, the implementation of the NEP, in the process of collectivization, etc. The main advantage of all the works - were complex mechanisms for sustainable development of agriculture in the moment and in the future.
